Soft Skills
The Art of Professional Interaction. Technical skills get the job done, 
but soft skills build relationships. We train teams in emotional 
intelligence, conflict resolution, and teamwork.
Training Modules:
Effective Communication: minimizing misunderstandings and 
improving clarity in speech and writing.
Time Management: techniques to prioritize tasks and increase 
productivity.
Leadership Development: preparing junior managers to lead 
teams effectively.Grooming Sessions
The Power of Appearance. Your team is the face of your brand. Our 
grooming workshops focus on personal presentation, dress codes, 
and professional hygiene.
Focus Areas:
Corporate Dressing: Guidelines on formal and business casual 
attire.
Personal Hygiene: Standards for grooming, hair, and overall 
presentation.
Body Language: understanding non-verbal cues to project 
confidence.Greeting Etiquettes and Basic Manners
First Class Impressions. In a service economy, courtesy is currency. We 
instill the fundamentals of corporate etiquette to ensure every 
interaction reflects high ethical standards.
Key Topics:
The Meet and Greet: Perfecting the handshake, eye contact, and 
introduction.
Telephone Etiquette: Professional handling of calls, holds, and 
transfers.
Email Manners: Writing professional, concise, and polite electronic 
correspondence.Language Training
Communication Without Borders. As a company operating in the UAE, 
Finland, and beyond, we understand the power of language. We offer 
training in key business languages to break down barriers.
Offerings:
English Proficiency: From basic functional English to advanced 
business fluency.
Local Dialects: Training for expatriate staff to communicate 
effectively in the local region.
Accent Neutralization: ensuring clear and globally understood 
communication.Book Keeping
Administrative Precision. Accuracy is the bedrock of trust. Our 
bookkeeping training modules cover the essentials of financial 
recording, documentation, and organized filing.
Skill Development:
Petty Cash Management: Handling day-to-day office expenses 
with accountability.
Digital Filing: Organizing documents in cloud storage for easy 
retrieval.
Basic Accounting: Understanding invoices, purchase orders, and
